fieldset.name: vmvendor
fieldset.label: General
fieldset.description: IMPORTANT NOTICE: Rollover most fields titles to have specific information and instructions showing as tooltips!

field.name: profileman
field.label: Profile manager
field.description: A profile manager is not required anymore for VMVendor, but you can enable it if you want to allow your users to separate things, having a public vendor profile and a private user profile. Also it would enable specific features such as Activity Stream announcements for Jomsocial etc...

field.name: vmitemid
field.label: Virtuemart Itemid
field.description: Menu Itemid to Virtuemart products

field.name: date_display
field.label: Date Display
field.description: http://php.net/manual/en/function.date.php - Default is: Y.m.d

field.name: naming
field.label: Naming
field.description: Should VMVMendor component mention your users by their Name or their usernames (those filled in during registration) ?

field.name: allow_deletion
field.label: Allow Product Deletion
field.description: Problem with deleting a digital good product is that if some users have purchased it, they might have some downloads left they could not get anymore...
field.option: Unpublish only (Recommended if selling digital goods)
Deletion allowed only if no sell (Recommended if selling digital goods)

field.name: termsurl
field.label: Terms / Conditions Url
field.description: As you let users upload goods to your server, you should make sure they have the rights and what they upload is their belonging and they allow you to sell it on your shop etc... Leave empty to disable it.

field.name: multilang_mode
field.label: Multilanguage behaviour
field.description: Added products get added only in vendor's front end language Virtuemart DB table or into every languages set in Virtuemart configuration page? If you set it to Every languages, product will be available in every languages but content (title and descriptions) will not be translated

field.name: restricted_group
field.label: Restricted group
field.description: Restrain user groups to upload and sell products.

field.name: vendor_views_access
field.label: Displayable views
field.description: Views that are accessible to all users.

fieldset.name: products
fieldset.label: Product forms
fieldset.description: This tab concerns product addition and edition forms.

field.name: forbidcatids
field.label: Forbidden Categories
field.description: Add here category IDs separated with coma for categories you don't want people to upload products in.This is usefull when you want to keep some categories for some featured products of yours when having an open marketplace in the rest of the catalogue categories.

field.name: onlycatids
field.label: Only Categories
field.description: Add here category IDs separated with coma for only categories you want people to upload products in.This is usefull when you want to keep some categories for some featured products of yours when having an open marketplace in the rest of the catalogue categories.

field.name: multicat
field.label: Enable Multicat (new)
field.description: Allow vendors to post products in multiple categories

field.name: autopublish
field.label: Auto Publish
field.description: Auto Publish submitted products without moderating these before. Enable this if you trust your vendors.

field.name: show_sku
field.label: Show Sku
field.description: Show Sku in forms. Sku is auto genarated: [userid].[Ymd].[His]

field.name: enable_sdesc
field.label: Enable Short description field
field.description: If disabled, Product short description will be set using the beginning of the full description. Having 2 descriptions fields might be unfriendly to some users in some cases...

field.name: wysiwyg_prod
field.label: WYSIWYG for Products
field.description: Enable Editor in product addition and Edition form for the decription field.

field.name: weightunits
field.label: Allowed Weight Units
field.description: Select the weight units vendors would find usefull to use. Multiple selection.

field.name: max_imagefields
field.label: Max Image Fields
field.description: Allowed number of images per products

field.name: imagemandatory
field.label: Image Upload field mandatory
field.description: If you set Vmvendor to show the image upload field, you can wish to make it mandatory. If enabled , only the first image field is mandatory.

field.name: maximgside
field.label: Max. Image Side size
field.description: Maximum size of the largest image side in pixels. Maximum size of the largest image side in pixels. If Uploaded image is larger, it will be resized.

field.name: thumbqual
field.label: Thumbnail Quality
field.description: Default: 90. Max: 100

field.name: enablefiles
field.label: File Upload field
field.description: Only enable this if you want your users to sell downoadable goods. This requires plgvm_istraxx_download plugin to have downloadable goods for sale in Virtuemart.

field.name: filemandatory
field.label: File Upload field mandatory
field.description: If you set Vmvendor to show the file upload field, you can wish to make it not mandatory. If enabled , only the first file field is mandatory.

field.name: allowedexts
field.label: Allowed File extensions
field.description: Only for the file submission. Images and Thumbnail are limited to gif, png and jpeg. Add here all the extensions for the file types you allow your vendors to upload. Separate each with a coma.

field.name: maxfilesize
field.label: Max File Size
field.description: The Maximum upload file size is anyway limited to your server's php.ini file configuration, but here you can set a limit below it. The default 8000000 bytes stand for 8MB.

field.name: max_filefields
field.label: Max File Fields
field.description: Allowed number of files per products

field.name: enableprice
field.label: Enable price
field.description: If you use VM as a catalog only, you might want to disable Price fields in VMVendor.

field.name: enablestock
field.label: Enable stock
field.description: If you sell digital products you might want to disable stock.

field.name: enablemanufield
field.label: Enable manufacturer field
field.description: This field is non mandatory

field.name: cat_suggest
field.label: Category Suggestion
field.description: In product addition and edition forms, enabling this adds a link next to the category selection field. It allows a user to suggest or add a new product category to the shop. 1st option only sends an email to admin with the suggested category name, description and parent category. 2nd option sends the same mail and adds the category to the shop as an unpublished category. 3rd and last option adds and publishes the new category without notifying admin.

fieldset.name: promotion
fieldset.label: Promotion
fieldset.description: RSS xml files are stored in /media/vmvendorss/

field.name: enablerss
field.label: Enable Vendor RSS
field.description: Only if Autopublish is on. This genrates a shop RSS feed for each vendor. A RSS feed icon will be available on vendor's user profile.

field.name: rsslimit
field.label: RSS Items limit
field.description: How many products to show in the vendor RSS feed. Default is 10.

field.name: emailnotify_addition
field.label: Email Notification on addition
field.description: Automatic email to email address specified below. Email countains links to the added VM product and to the vendor's profile page if applicable. Make sure your smtp server is configured correctly. Email notification is forced if Autopublish parameter is not activated.

field.name: emailnotify_updated
field.label: Email Notification on update
field.description: Automatic email to email address specified below. Email countains links to the added VM product and to the vendor's profile page if applicable. Make sure your smtp server is configured correctly.

field.name: to
field.label: Additional Recipient Email Address
field.description: Additional Email Address to be notified

field.name: minimum_price
field.label: Minimum Price
field.description: Set a minimum price. Set 0 if you allow free products to be added.

field.name: aup_ratio
field.label: Points/Currency ratio
field.description: How many points for one of your currency unit.

field.name: commission
field.label: Commission Percentage
field.description: Percentage of sales that goes to the site admin. This does not actually go to site admin , it is just deducted from the Vendor points reward that goes to vendors. This value can be overriden by the value set in vendor plans.

field.name: tax_mode
field.label: Tax mode
field.description: As an admin you can create tax(es) rules in Virtuemart administration and set these as 'shared' so they apply to every vendors products. But you can also let vendors create and manage their own taxes. If you set this, vendors will be able to add and edit taxes from their dashboard. These taxes will be set only for their own products but set to every categories, every shopper groups and without time limitation.

field.name: enable_discount
field.label: Allow discount price
field.description: Allow vendors to set discount prices in addition of the original price. The Discount price will overide the final price

fieldset.name: dashboard
fieldset.label: Dashboard
fieldset.description: The Dashboard page is a private page for Vendors showing their latest sells with customer contacts and statistics.

field.name: customercontactform
field.label: Customer contact form
field.option: Email Form with Site admin email in CCi

field.name: show_postalinfo
field.label: Show Postal information
field.description: Show customer postal information. This could be useless if you only sell digital goods.

field.name: allow_orderstatuschange
field.label: Allow Orders Status Change
field.description: Enabling this allows vendors to change theirc customers orders status from C (confirmed) to S(shipped). This is not supported if you don't use C and S status codes for Confirmed and Shipped. This is not recommended for downloadable goods as the st42_download (more recently called plgvm_istraxx_download ) plugin changes the status from C to S automaticaly when the forsale file has been downloaded.
field.option: Only for products without forSale files

field.name: show_worldmapstats
field.label: Show Worldmap stats
field.description: If your site is local, within the same country. There is no point displaying a world map in your vendors dashboards

field.name: update_notifies_admin
field.label: Notify Admin
field.description: Notify admin on order item status changed from confirmed to shipped or cancel

field.name: update_notifies_customer
field.label: Notify Customer
field.description: Notify customer on order item status changed from confirmed to shipped or cancel

field.name: manage_reviews
field.label: Reviews management
field.description: If enabled, vendor will be able to publish or delete reviews on own products.

field.name: show_pointstab
field.label: Show Points Tab
field.description: Show or hide points tab.

field.name: vendorcontactform
field.label: Vendor contact form
field.description: PMS can only be enabled if you have Jomsocial or EasySocial enabled

field.name: profileitemid
field.label: Social Profile Itemid
field.description: Menu Item id to your user profiles (CB, Jomsocial or EasySocial)

field.name: wysiwyg_prof
field.label: WYSIWYG Editor for Profile
field.description: Enable Editor in profile.

field.name: paypalemail_field
field.label: Paypal Email field
field.description: Show paypal email field in Vendor profile edition form. This field can be used in the Vendor Points2Paypal module form to pre fill the paypal email field and in upcoming Paypal Adaptive Payment plugin.

field.name: appid
field.label: Facebook App ID
field.description: Required to use Html5 and send button (recommended)

field.name: fb_width
field.label: FB width
field.description: Required to use Html5 and send button (recommended)

field.name: products_category_link
field.label: Show Products category link
field.description: Add the hypertext link to product category on vendor profile products list

field.name: products_category_filter
field.label: Show Products category filter
field.description: If vendor has more than one product, you can enable a category filter on the vendor profile. You can have it to only display vendors categories, but it can be very ressource consuming on profiles with hundreds of products.

field.name: enable_rating
field.label: Enable Star ratings
field.description: Enable star rating system. Vendor can not rate themeselves. Customers can rate vendor once and update their rating for a vendor anytime

field.name: rating_stars
field.label: How many Stars
field.description: Stars have halves too. Default is 5 stars allowing to rate from 0.5 to 5

field.name: purchasetorate
field.label: Purchase required?
field.description: Has user to be a customer of this vendor to be able to rate? If not any user will be able to rate any vendor.

field.name: enable_jusergroup
field.label: Show J! Usergroup
field.description: Show Joomla usergroup on user profile. Usefull when you have various vendor plans.

field.name: enable_jcomments
field.label: jComments integration on profile
field.description: Add the jComment 3rd party component integration to vendor profile pages as an additional tab. Only enable this if you have the jComments component installed. Download it free from http://www.joomlatune.com.

field.name: enable_fbcomments
field.label: Facebook Comments on profile
field.description: This requires you previously set your Facebook Appid

field.name: log_profilevisits
field.label: Log Profile Visits
field.description: Thsi will record profile visits and visitors and give access to a new page from own vendor profile (eye icon) A new menu type is also available if you want a menu shortcut.

field.name: exclude_users
field.label: Exclude Users
field.description: Exclude Users from being logged when visiting profiles. Comma separated list of users IDs

field.name: daystolog
field.label: Days to log
field.description: Days to log. Default: 30

fieldset.name: downloads
fieldset.label: Downloads
fieldset.description: This tab concerns Digital Goods. If you want VMVendor to manage and sell digital goods like ebooks, softwares, apps, music or videos etc... , you must use Ekerner Virtuemart Downloadable Products to be purchased separately from http://shop.ekerner.com.au/index.php/shop/joomla-extensions/vmcustom-downloadable-detail . If you change the following settings, new values will only apply to new product additions

field.name: freefiles_folder
field.label: Free files Folder
field.description: If you want to store free files securely , you can make VMVendor store these in the Virtuemart Safe Path folder instead of the Media folder.

fieldset.name: customfields
fieldset.label: Custom Fields
fieldset.description: VMVendor will be integrating some 3rd party Virtuemart Custom Field plugins from Nordmograph.com

field.name: enable_vm2tags
field.label: Enable VM2tags component support
field.description: Product Tagging solution. Vendors will be able to add tags to a product. tags will be searchable and displayed in some tag clouds modules.

field.name: tagslimit
field.label: Tags Limit
field.description: Limit the allowed quantity of tags per product. This limitation only applies to front end tags submission.

field.name: enable_vm2geolocator
field.label: Enable VM2geolocator plugin support
field.description: Product Geolocation plugin. Vendors will be able to plot a location on a map for their product location

field.name: vm2tags_asmetakeywords
field.label: Tags as meta keywords
field.description: Also add VM2tags tags as Product metakeywords

field.name: enable_embedvideo
field.label: Enable EmbedVideo plugin support
field.description: Product Geolocation plugin. Vendors will be able to plot a location on a map for their product location

field.name: enable_corecustomfields
field.label: Allow Core Custom Fields (Beta)
field.description: Enable Virtuemat core custom fields for products addition and edition forms

field.name: customfields_autoadd
field.label: Auto Add Customfields
field.description: In case you need to have custom fields added autoamtically to your Virtuemart Products without the need to show on VMVendor form (ex. shipping calendar). Comma separated fields ID list

field.name: shipment_mode
field.label: Shipment management (beta)
field.description: As an admin you can enable shipment method in Virtuemart for vendors to pick from and make and set as their own shipment methods.

field.name: reset_onpricestatus
field.label: Reset Reviews on Price changed
field.description: Reset Product Reviews and rating when item price is updated from Free to commercial.

field.name: load_bootstrap_css
field.label: Load Bootstrap CSS
field.description: In the rare cases your template would not load Bootstrap CSS, wich would result in various layout issues in VMVendor such as Vendor profile and Dashboard tabs broken, you can enable this to load the Bootstrap CSS

field.name: acy_listid
field.label: Vendor ACY Mailing list ID
field.description: You can use ACY Mailing list component to have Vendors added to a list when they upload their first product. Great way to make the communication between site administration and vendors easier. Create a list in the ACYmailing component for Vendors and specify the List ID here.

field.name: profiletypes_mode
field.label: Profile types
field.description: Allows to restrict VMVendor features to one or more Jomsocial or EasySocial profile types. JSPT option only possible if you have the Jomsocial Profile type 3rd party component installed and correctly set up.

field.name: profiletypes_ids
field.label: Profile Types IDs
field.description: If you enabled the previous parameter, set here the profiletypes IDs for users to be allowed to use VMVendor. Separate multiple profiletypes IDs with coma.
